# thetalake_tag (Resource)

Theta Lake Tag Resource. Manages a tag in Theta Lake.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_tag" "example" {
  name        = "Example Tag"
  description = "This is an example tag"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Tag Name

### Optional

- `description` (String) Tag Description

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Tag ID
